pullRequest.title: Update code and tests to still build and test with Java 7
pullRequest.bodyText:
Update rest.handler.config bundle to be Java 7 byte code to make restConnector-2.0 feature work with Java 7
Change tests to use Java EE 7 features instead of EE8 features and add RepeatTests to test them with Java EE 8 features as well.
Update Java EE8 or MP tests that require Java 8, to have a MinimumJavaLevel set to Java 8 so they don't run with Java 7
Update logic to get caller to be generic and work on different Java levels due to number of stack elements in the thread stack being different.
Update transaction.test.util to be Java 7 to support com.ibm.ws.wsat tests running with Java 7.

commit.message:
Update transport compression tests to use servlet 3.1

- Use servlet-3.1 feature so that tests can also run with Java 7

Update to generate 1.7 byte code for rest.handler.config component

- restConnector-2.0 feature would not start with Java 7 because this
bundle was compiled to Java 8 byte code when it shouldn't have been.

More updates for tests to run with Java 7

- HibernateSearchTest uses cdi 2.0 so set minimum to Java 8
- In ClientMain I changed order so that the stack works correctly with
Java 7
- PackageCommandTest uses Java 8 only features for a new test.  Changed
minimum Java level to 8.

nodes.bodyText: Minor Comment: should read "in any" ... I think the same typo got copied to the other bnd files as well.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -18,6 +18,11 @@ src: \
 
 fat.project: true
 
+# Define additional tested features that are NOT present any any XML files in this bucket.

commit.message:
More updates to get tests passing with Java 7.

- Update transaction.test.util to be Java 7.
- Update messaging.open_clientcontainer_fat logic for getting the caller
to work on Java 7, Java 8, etc.  Using a generic approach that will work
on all JDKs.
- Update new JAXRS 2.0 tests to only run with Java 8 since it depends on
OT which needs Java 8.
- Update JCA tests to use Java EE 7 features and then repeat the tests
with Java EE 8 features.
- Update http compression tests to repeat with Java EE 8 features
- Update wsat_fat tests to use Java EE 7 features and repeat with Java
EE 8 features.
- Update kernel.feature_fat test to use servlet 3.1 instead of 4.0 to
work with Java 7.

commit.message:
Code review updates

- Fix typo in comment in bnd files that was copied from
build.example_fat.

Update Util.getCaller to not take a method name

- In order to simplify the getCaller method invocations to not have to
pass a method name, Donald asked for it to remove the argument to make
it easily to use.
